description: Display of one freestanding internally illuminated/poster display advertisement (measuring 9.2m wide x 4.6m high) displayed in a 9.2m wide x 8.1m high structure (3m from the ground to the base). Advertisement displayed to face east bound traffic on the A40 Western Avenue (Advertisement Consent)
decision_conditions: 1. The proposed double sided internally illuminated LED advertisement, by reason of its size in particular the height , siting and design, would result in an advertisement which is unduly prominent, visually obtrusive and would have an adverse impact upon the visual amenity of the surrounding area, in particular upon the setting and visual openness of the adjacent designated Green Corridors, contrary to Policy 2.18 of the London Plan, Policy 3.1 and 5.3 of Ealing's Development (Core) Strategy, and Policy 2.18 of Ealing's Development Management DPD.  2. The proposed double sided internally illuminated LED advertisement, by reason of its size and siting at a prominent location, would result in an advertisement which would cause undesirable distraction to drivers using the A40 highway adversely affecting highway safety.As such the proposal is contrary to Policy 1.1(f) of Ealing's Development (Core) Strategy and Policy 6.3 of the London Plan.
